name: project-health-auditor
description: Multi-dimensional code health analysis with complexity, churn, and test coverage - identifies technical debt hot spots
features: Cyclomatic complexity analysis with health scores (0-100)
Git churn tracking - identifies frequently changing files
Test coverage mapping - finds gaps in test coverage
Technical debt hot spots - high complexity + high churn + no tests
4 MCP tools: list_repo_files, file_metrics, git_churn, map_tests
